title: iPhone 3G[S] Hacktivated iOS 4 UPDATED!
description:
File: iPhone 3G[S] 4.0 Hacktivated
Description: This file is a custom restore file with no custom logos, hactivation, and the default partition sizes. This file can be used to restore your jailbroken iPhone 3G[S] (old bootrom) to version 4.0.

What is hactivation? Hacktivation is used for non-official carriers such as T-Mobile, instead of activating your iPhone with iTunes it is automatically activated.


THIS VERSION WAS MADE WITH PWNAGETOOL 4.01
